mapper.insert: insert into yuhan_homework_comment_table (YUHAN_HOMEWORK_COMMENT_HOMEWORK_NUMBER, YUHAN_HOMEWORK_COMMENT_MEMBER_PROFESSOR_MEMBER_NUMBER, YUHAN_HOMEWORK_COMMENT_CONTENT, PROFESSOR_NAME) values (#{hwno}, #{professorNO}, #{comment}, #{professorName})
mapper.select: select YUHAN_HOMEWORK_COMMENT_NUMBER as repNo, YUHAN_HOMEWORK_COMMENT_CONTENT as comment, date_format(YUHAN_HOMEWORK_COMMENT_DATE , "%Y-%m-%d") as repDate, PROFESSOR_NAME as professorName from yuhan_homework_comment_table where YUHAN_HOMEWORK_COMMENT_HOMEWORK_NUMBER = #{hwno} order by YUHAN_HOMEWORK_COMMENT_NUMBER desc, YUHAN_HOMEWORK_COMMENT_DATE desc
